intro: Greatwall Boy's Hostel is located on  Pancheshwor Marg, Tinkune Kathmandu .Greatwall Boy's Hostel focuses on preparing the family type environment with satisfactory facilities like 24 hrs Electricity & WiFi, Attached Showers, locker room, Parking Spaces, hygienic food, laundry services etc.
